mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TB_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL AS productNo FROM dual
INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT ( PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_Name, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_PRICE, CATEGORY_NO, USER_NO ) VALUES ( #{productNo}, #{productName}, #{productContent}, #{productPrice}, #{categoryNo}, #{userNo} )
INSERT INTO TB_PRODUCT_PHOTO ( PRODUCT_PHOTO_NO, PRODUCT_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_TB_PRODUCT_PHOTO.NEXTVAL, #{productNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{fileLevel} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, USER_NO, COUNT, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_PHOTO PP ON (P.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO AND FILE_LEVEL = 1) WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CONTENT, COUNT, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT_PHOTO PP ON(P.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO AND FILE_LEVEL = 2) WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_NO DESC
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT_PHOTO JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE PRODUCT_NO= #{productNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
